Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, the XOR operator here is between checking local affiliation (D) and skipping it. So, the process after preliminary scoring (C) has an XOR branch. Let me recall what an XOR operator does in this context. An XOR operator means that the outcome of the first condition is independent of the second. So, if D is true, then the XOR branch selects D, leading to a subtle score uplift. If D is false, then the XOR branch skips it, which is the skip transition.
